title: NexPoint Real Estate Finance Announces 2021 Dividend Income Tax Treatment - inForney.com

description: DALLAS, Feb. 2, 2022 /PRNewswire/ -- NexPoint Real Estate Finance, Inc. (NYSE: NREF) (the "Company") announced today the final income allocations of the Company's 2021 dividend distributions on its common
